segments.text: I glance at the scene and take it all in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink's running, water filling the basin slowly at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now it's pouring over, forming a stream down the front.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman dries her plate, unaware of the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress and apron look practical for the task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight highlights the open window and garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes and path outside seem well-kept.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the boy's climbing the stool carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He grabs a cookie from the jar up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Wait, the stool's starting to lean back!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching too, excited for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a sneaky adventure for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the wet floor adds an unexpected danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overall, it's a typical busy kitchen moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
